line1.text: Dad taught us everything about exploring! Even when we were too young to go out into the real world, we had our own adventures right in our backyard.

line2.text: It never got boring with Roy and Emily...

line1.text: But when we grew older, we had fewer adventures with each other. Most times, they were busy with other stuff.

line2.text: I missed those times and wished that one day, hopefully, we could start again...
